name: The Word Warrior
description:
The Word Warrior is a short Wordle game. The original list of available words came from Charles Reid (Github: sgb-words.txt). This list of the more common words was then abridged by me to remove potentially age-inappropriate (8-12 year olds) words from being selected. The player has been summoned to the library to use his Word Power to restore the damage done by a mischievous gremlin. Solve 3 wordle puzzles to reshelve the fallen books and win the game.  Players can view their own stats of wins and losses.

Game time is approximately 10-20 minutes.
